src:
西非貝南傳海盜攻擊 挪威貨船9名菲藉船員被綁架

04 Nov 2019, 12:32

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月04日訊】西非國家貝南（Benin）港市科托奴（Cotonou）2日早晨，港口外發生一起海盜綁架貨船上等候入港的9名船員。
港口當局說，貨船「伯尼泰號」（Bonita）在距離港口入口約14公里處遭到攻擊，船上8名船員外加船長被綁架。
伯尼泰號船東挪威的烏格蘭公司（Ugland）證實船員遭綁架事件，稱伯尼泰2日早晨在貝南科托奴港外等候停泊將石膏卸貨時，9名船員被海盜帶走，其他的船員通知地方當局，船在當天稍晚抵達科托奴港。
公司發言人告訴挪威當地媒體，被綁架船員都是菲律賓人。
(責任編輯：盧勇信)
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/04/a102699788.html
text:
West African Beinan pirate attack Norwegian cargo ship 9 Philippine borrowed crew was kidnapped

04 Nov 2019, 12:32

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 04, 2019] Cotonou, a port city in Benin, West Africa, on the morning of the 2nd, a pirate kidnapped cargo ship outside the port waiting for 9 crew members to enter Hong Kong.
The port authorities said that the cargo ship "Bonita" was attacked about 14 kilometers from the port entrance and that eight crew members and captains were abducted.
Ugland, the owner of the Bernietai, confirmed that the crew was kidnapped, saying that Bernietai was waiting to be parked outside the port of Cotono, Benin, on the morning of the 2nd. When the gypsum was unloaded, nine crew members were taken away by the pirates. The other crew informed the local authorities that the ship arrived at Cotonou Port later that day.
A company spokesperson told the Norwegian local media that the kidnapped crew were Filipinos.
(Editor: Lu Yongxin)
